meanings.definition: A type of swimsuit consisting of a tank top and bikini bottoms.
meanings.sent1: She wore stylish tankinis to the beach.
meanings.sent2: Many women prefer tankinis over traditional one-piece swimsuits.
meanings.sent3: The tankinis looked like a trendy combination of a tank top and bikini bottoms.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of tankinis was as colorful as a tropical reef.
meanings.sent5: The store displayed a variety of tankinis in different patterns and colors.
